alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Guernsey; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 12:36PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN GUERNSEY...COSHOCTON... MUSKINGUM AND CENTRAL TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES... At 1234 PM EDT, an organized line of snow showers were located along a line extending from near Rittman to Glenmont to near Newark. Movement was east at 30 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with these snow showers. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, New Philadelphia, Dover, Coshocton, Newcomerstown, Strasburg, West Lafayette, Sugarcreek, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Dresden, and Frazeysburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 145 and 166. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 67 and 95. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
